brief_description: The Scheme provides financial assistance for purchasing vehicles to enhance transportation facilities in rural areas. It includes grants for regular vehicles, e-rickshaws, and ambulances under specified conditions.
detailed_description: The &quot;Mukhyamantri Gram Parivahan Yojana&quot; launched by the Transport Department, Government of Bihar, aimed at improving transportation facilities in all panchayats of the state. It offers financial assistance to beneficiaries for purchasing vehicles.
benefits: Standard vehicles: 50% of the purchase price or up to ₹1,00,000/-. E-rickshaws: 50% of the purchase price or up to ₹70,000/-. Ambulances: 50% of the purchase price or up to ₹2,00,000/-.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a resident of the state. The applicant must belong to a rural area. The applicant should not have benefited from a similar scheme previously. For ambulance purchases, applicants must be willing to use it for public health services.

steps: Registration Process: Step-1: Visit the official Website . Click on the "Registration" button. Step-2: Enter your Mobile Number, New Password, Email, and Driving License No. Step-3: Click on "Register" to complete the registration process.  Application Process: Step-1: Login with your registered Mobile Number and Password. Step-2: On the Application page, fill in all the required details and upload the relevant documents. Step-3: Then click on the declaration form and click on "Submit". Step-4: Once all details are filled in correctly, click on "Print Application" to get a copy of the application form.

documents_required: Proof of Address. Proof of Birth. Caste Certificate. Aadhaar Details (Optional). Driving License. Marksheets of qualified exams.
